issues.title: 2025-08-18 至 2025-08-24 周报 / Weekly
issues.summaryCN: 本周经严核的科技/IT大事件精选。
issues.summaryEN: Verified, cross-sourced tech/IT developments for the week.

items.title: 苹果修补被利用零日 / Apple patches exploited zero-day
factsCN: 苹果发布多平台安全更新，修复 ImageIO 越界写 CVE-2025-43300；苹果称该漏洞可能在定向攻击中被利用。
factsEN: Apple shipped security updates across platforms to fix ImageIO out-of-bounds write CVE-2025-43300, which Apple says may have been exploited in targeted attacks.

links.label: Apple 支持：安全更新（官方）

items.whyCN: 零日影响 Apple 生态多版本，应尽快更新以降低被定向攻击的风险。
items.whyEN: A cross-platform Apple zero-day warrants rapid patching to reduce targeted attack exposure.

items.title: 微软发布 OOB 修复重置问题 / Microsoft ships OOB reset fix
factsCN: 微软针对 8 月补丁后出现的“重置此电脑/修复安装”失败问题发布 OOB 修复（含 KB5066188/KB5066189），并记录 NDI 流媒体性能回退为已知问题。
factsEN: Microsoft issued out-of-band fixes (including KB5066188/KB5066189) for Reset/Repair failures after August updates and documented NDI streaming regressions as a known issue.

keyInfo.impact: 功能异常 + OOB 修复

items.whyCN: 影响系统恢复与制作/直播工作流，IT 管理需优先评估并应用 OOB 修复。
items.whyEN: Impacts reset/recovery and NDI workflows; IT teams should prioritize applying the OOB fix.

items.title: Chrome 139 安全更新 / Chrome 139 security update
factsCN: Chrome 稳定版 139.0.7258.138/.139 于 8 月 19 日发布，包含多项安全修复（含 CVE-2025-9132）。
factsEN: Chrome Stable 139.0.7258.138/.139 landed on Aug 19 with multiple security fixes, including CVE-2025-9132.

links.label: 加拿大网络安全中心通报

items.whyCN: 桌面主流浏览器高频修复，企业需按变更窗口尽快推进更新。
items.whyEN: High-velocity browser fixes; enterprises should roll out the update promptly.

items.title: Firefox 142 正式发布 / Firefox 142 released
factsCN: Mozilla 发布 Firefox 142（含 Android/iOS 同步更新），并修复多项安全问题（MFSA-2025-64）。
factsEN: Mozilla shipped Firefox 142 (with Android/iOS), addressing multiple security issues per MFSA-2025-64.
items.whyCN: 覆盖多平台的版本跃迁，需兼顾兼容性与安全测试。
items.whyEN: Cross-platform release; teams should test compatibility and apply the security fixes.

items.title: Cloudflare 比例限流引发 5xx 错误 / Cloudflare throttling incident
factsCN: Cloudflare 8 月 21 日称在恢复缓存缺失导致的请求增加时引入比例限流策略，引发少量区域 5xx 错误并已回退。
factsEN: On Aug 21, Cloudflare said proportional throttling during recovery from cache misses caused localized 5xx errors before rollback.

keyInfo.impact: 局部 5xx 错误；策略回退

items.whyCN: 对大规模分布式策略变更的风险警示，业务需评估边缘策略回退预案。
items.whyEN: Highlights risk in distributed policy changes; ensure robust rollback plans at the edge.

items.title: NVIDIA 推出 Spectrum-XGS / NVIDIA unveils Spectrum-XGS
factsCN: NVIDIA 于 Hot Chips 宣布 Spectrum-XGS，以以太网“跨域规模”连接多数据中心构建统一 AI 集群。
factsEN: At Hot Chips, NVIDIA announced Spectrum-XGS to ‘scale-across’ data centers via Ethernet for unified AI clusters.
items.whyCN: 以太网方案加码大规模 AI 集群互联，供给侧与架构选型受关注。
items.whyEN: Ethernet-based fabrics advance for large-scale AI, impacting supply and design choices.

items.title: GitLab 18.3 发布 / GitLab 18.3 released
factsCN: GitLab 发布 18.3，带来移动合并、内置加载测试等增强；包含多项修复与改进。
factsEN: GitLab 18.3 shipped with enhancements like mobile merges and load testing, plus various fixes.
items.whyCN: 影响 CI/CD 流水线与团队协作效率，企业版可评估升级收益。
items.whyEN: Affects CI/CD workflows and collaboration; evaluate upgrade benefits for Enterprise.

items.title: GitLab 18.2.4 维护更新 / GitLab 18.2.4 maintenance
factsCN: GitLab 发布 18.2.4 维护版本，修复稳定性与功能问题（18.2 系列）。
factsEN: GitLab released 18.2.4 maintenance update for stability and functional fixes in the 18.2 series.
items.whyCN: 维护版本便于低风险合入，减少停机窗口。
items.whyEN: A low-risk patch release suitable for routine maintenance windows.

items.title: OpenAI 推出项目级记忆 / OpenAI adds project-only memory
factsCN: OpenAI 在 ChatGPT 发布说明中新增“仅在项目内记忆”功能，默认关闭、需手动开启。
factsEN: OpenAI’s ChatGPT release notes introduced project-only memory (opt-in and off by default).
items.whyCN: 在团队协作与合规场景中降低跨项目数据记忆的隐私风险。
items.whyEN: Helps limit cross-project memory for privacy-sensitive teamwork.

items.title: Intel 在 Hot Chips 展示 288 核 Xeon / Intel shows 288-core Xeon
factsCN: Intel 在 Hot Chips 2025 介绍 288 核 Sierra Forest Xeon 细节，主打高密度能效。
factsEN: At Hot Chips 2025, Intel disclosed 288-core Sierra Forest Xeon details targeting high-density efficiency.
items.whyCN: 高核数路线影响 TCO 与算力密度评估，适配云原生与微服务负载。
items.whyEN: High-core-count designs shift TCO and density calculus for cloud-native workloads.

items.title: Intel 详解 HBM SPD 与缓存策略 / Intel details HBM SPD/cache
factsCN: Intel 在 Hot Chips 介绍 HBM SPD 模型与“自适应感知”缓存路径策略，改善带宽与稳定性。
factsEN: Intel shared HBM SPD modeling and ‘adaptive-aware’ cache path strategies to boost bandwidth and stability.

image.caption: Intel Hot Chips 技术要点

items.whyCN: 内存与缓存路径优化影响 AI/HPC 实效吞吐与可预测性。
items.whyEN: Memory/cache path strategies matter for sustained throughput and predictability in AI/HPC.

items.title: Google Pixel 10 系列正式发布 / Google launches Pixel 10 line
factsCN: Google 举办 Pixel 10 发布会，推出 Pixel 10 Pro/XL、降价的 Pixel 10，以及 Pixel Watch 9 与 Pixel Buds Pro 2。
factsEN: Google’s Pixel 10 event introduced Pixel 10 Pro/XL, a lower-priced Pixel 10, plus Pixel Watch 9 and Pixel Buds Pro 2.
items.whyCN: 旗舰机型与价格策略调整影响 Android 高端市场竞争格局。
items.whyEN: Flagship specs and pricing reshape competition in the Android high-end segment.

items.title: Pixel 10 Pro/XL 规格公开 / Pixel 10 Pro/XL specs
factsCN: Google 公布 Pixel 10 Pro/XL 详细规格与价格，搭载最新 Tensor 芯片与多项 AI 功能。
factsEN: Google detailed Pixel 10 Pro/XL pricing and specs with the latest Tensor and new AI features.
items.whyCN: 参数与定价影响渠道备货与竞品策略，需关注上市节奏。
items.whyEN: Specs/pricing affect channel planning and rival positioning; watch retail timelines.

items.title: Pixel Watch 9/ Buds Pro 2 发布 / Pixel Watch 9 & Buds Pro 2
factsCN: Google 同场发布 Pixel Watch 9 与 Pixel Buds Pro 2，主打续航与 AI 体验升级。
factsEN: Google also launched Pixel Watch 9 and Pixel Buds Pro 2, focusing on battery and AI features.
items.whyCN: 生态完善与 AI 协同增强提升用户粘性与溢价能力。
items.whyEN: Stronger device ecosystem and AI tie-ins increase stickiness and pricing power.

items.title: Google Cloud 推出 DSPM 预览 / Google Cloud DSPM preview
factsCN: Google Cloud 宣布数据安全态势管理（DSPM）预览，覆盖数据发现、分类与风险评估。
factsEN: Google Cloud launched a preview of Data Security Posture Management (DSPM) for discovery, classification, and risk.
items.whyCN: 帮助解决多数据源敏感数据可见性与合规审计痛点。
items.whyEN: Improves visibility and compliance for sensitive data across clouds.

items.title: Google Cloud 推出合规管理预览 / Compliance Manager preview
factsCN: Google Cloud 宣布 Compliance Manager 预览版，提供合规模板、证据收集与审计报告生成功能。
factsEN: Google Cloud announced Compliance Manager preview with templates, evidence collection, and reporting.
items.whyCN: 降低合规审计成本，利于受监管行业上云。
items.whyEN: Lowers audit overhead and aids regulated industry adoption.

items.title: GKE 推出 Auto-IPAM / GKE adds Auto-IPAM
factsCN: GKE 发布 Auto-IPAM，自动为节点与 Pod 规划地址以降低冲突与运维复杂度。
factsEN: GKE’s Auto-IPAM automatically plans node/Pod addresses to reduce conflicts and ops complexity.
items.whyCN: 缓解多集群地址规划与冲突问题，有利规模化落地。
items.whyEN: Eases multi-cluster addressing at scale for production Kubernetes.

items.title: Workspace CSE 支持 Cloud HSM / Workspace CSE + Cloud HSM
factsCN: Google 宣布 Workspace 客户端加密（CSE）支持采用 Cloud HSM 托管密钥。
适用于邮件与文档场景的密钥主权与合规需求。
factsEN: Google announced Cloud HSM as a key service option for Workspace Client-Side Encryption (CSE),
supporting key sovereignty and compliance for mail/docs.
items.whyCN: 满足主权与监管要求的密钥托管，利于受监管行业使用 CSE。
items.whyEN: Key sovereignty via Cloud HSM broadens regulated adoption of Workspace CSE.

items.title: Mandiant 分析 CORNFLAKE.V3 / Mandiant on CORNFLAKE.V3
factsCN: Mandiant 报告新版本 CORNFLAKE.V3 后门及其持久化与规避手法。
建议蓝队根据 IoC 与 TTP 强化检测与响应。
factsEN: Mandiant detailed CORNFLAKE.V3 backdoor, persistence and evasion techniques,
recommending blue teams act on IOCs and TTPs.
items.whyCN: 有助于完善检测规则与狩猎线索，应尽快合入 SOC 流程。
items.whyEN: Feeds detections and hunting; incorporate indicators into SOC pipelines.

items.title: Salesloft/Drift 撤销 Salesforce 令牌 / OAuth tokens revoked
factsCN: Google GTIG 报告攻击者滥用 Salesloft Drift 与 Salesforce 集成的 OAuth 令牌大规模导出数据；8 月 20 日 Salesloft 与 Salesforce 撤销相关令牌并下架 AppExchange 应用。
factsEN: Google GTIG reported large-scale data exfiltration via Salesloft Drift’s Salesforce OAuth tokens; on Aug 20, Salesloft and Salesforce revoked tokens and removed the app from AppExchange.

keyInfo.impact: OAuth 令牌撤销；取证与复核

items.whyCN: 暴露 SaaS-to-SaaS 集成与 OAuth 令牌风险，需加固集成权限与日志审计。
items.whyEN: Underscores OAuth and SaaS-to-SaaS risks; tighten scopes and audit connected apps.

items.title: Apple 开发者税费/价格更新 / App Store tax/price updates
factsCN: Apple 宣布部分国家/地区的税费与价格调整，涉及加拿大全球等若干市场。
factsEN: Apple announced tax and price updates for select countries/regions across the App Store.
items.whyCN: 影响订阅/内购收入结算与本地化定价策略。
items.whyEN: Impacts subscription/IAP revenue and localized pricing strategies.

items.title: Edge 稳定/扩展稳定通道更新 / Edge Stable/Extended updates
factsCN: 微软发布 Edge 稳定与扩展稳定通道更新（含 138/139 系列），并提供安全更新说明。
factsEN: Microsoft shipped Edge Stable and Extended Stable updates (v138/139 series) with security notes.
items.whyCN: 与 Chromium 同步风险窗口，建议与 Chrome 同步更新节奏。
items.whyEN: Aligns with Chromium risk window; keep update cadence in lockstep with Chrome.
